mapper.sql: tthy_id, tthy_lbpm, djxh, tthy_dz, tthy_fpbl, tthy_gjhdqsz_dm, tthy_lrr_dm, tthy_lrrq, tthy_sjgsdq, tthy_sjtbsj, tthy_tzbl, tthy_tzfhhhrmc, tthy_tzfhhhrzjhm, tthy_tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, tthy_tzfjjxz_dm, tthy_tzje, tthy_uuid, tthy_xgr_dm, tthy_xgrq, tthy_yxqq, tthy_yxqz, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_tax_qytzf (tthy_id, tthy_lbpm, djxh, tthy_dz, tthy_fpbl, tthy_gjhdqsz_dm, tthy_lrr_dm, tthy_lrrq, tthy_sjgsdq, tthy_sjtbsj, tthy_tzbl, tthy_tzfhhhrmc, tthy_tzfhhhrzjhm, tthy_tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, tthy_tzfjjxz_dm, tthy_tzje, tthy_uuid, tthy_xgr_dm, tthy_xgrq, tthy_yxqq, tthy_yxqz, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime) values (#{id}, #{tthyLbpm}, #{djxh}, #{tthyDz}, #{tthyFpbl}, #{tthyGjhdqszDm}, #{tthyLrrDm}, #{tthyLrrq}, #{tthySjgsdq}, #{tthySjtbsj}, #{tthyTzbl}, #{tthyTzfhhhrmc}, #{tthyTzfhhhrzjhm}, #{tthyTzfhhhrzjzlDm}, #{tthyTzfjjxzDm}, #{tthyTzje}, #{tthyUuid}, #{tthyXgrDm}, #{tthyXgrq}, #{tthyYxqq}, #{tthyYxqz}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{updatorid}, #{updatetime})
mapper.update: update t_tax_qytzf set tthy_lbpm = #{tthyLbpm}, djxh = #{djxh}, tthy_dz = #{tthyDz}, tthy_fpbl = #{tthyFpbl}, tthy_gjhdqsz_dm = #{tthyGjhdqszDm}, tthy_lrr_dm = #{tthyLrrDm}, tthy_lrrq = #{tthyLrrq}, tthy_sjgsdq = #{tthySjgsdq}, tthy_sjtbsj = #{tthySjtbsj}, tthy_tzbl = #{tthyTzbl}, tthy_tzfhhhrmc = #{tthyTzfhhhrmc}, tthy_tzfhhhrzjhm = #{tthyTzfhhhrzjhm}, tthy_tzfhhhrzjzl_dm = #{tthyTzfhhhrzjzlDm}, tthy_tzfjjxz_dm = #{tthyTzfjjxzDm}, tthy_tzje = #{tthyTzje}, tthy_uuid = #{tthyUuid}, tthy_xgr_dm = #{tthyXgrDm}, tthy_xgrq = #{tthyXgrq}, tthy_yxqq = #{tthyYxqq}, tthy_yxqz = #{tthyYxqz}, creatorid = #{creatorid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatorid = #{updatorid}, updatetime = now() where tthy_id = #{id}
